outline:
1. to roll, roll away, roll down, roll together
    1. (Qal) to roll
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to roll up
      2. to flow down
    3. (Pilpel) to roll
    4. (Poal) to be rolled
    5. (Hithpoel) to roll oneself
    6. (Hithpalpel) to roll oneself
    7. (Hiphil) to roll away
kjv_def: commit, remove, roll (away, down, together), run down, seek occasion, trust, wallow.
